thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice location
thread.title_full: Nice location - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Suresh S
title: Nice location
text: Stayed here for 3 nights. Very nice hotel, clean, tidy and well kept. The best thing about this hotel is the location. A short walk from the coliseum and a short walk from the main shopping and buzzing areas, in fact it's a short walk from all the main sights as we walked to all the meeting points for our organised tours. Would recommend
